title: Hextech Crafting Crashes
body: Every time I open up the Hextech Crafting tab it crashes ): I just want to open some chests!

replies.body: If you have Plays.tv or Overwolf on try closing those :) It helped me!

Try yo turn off Curse Overwolf or Play.TV, for me it was Play.tv the problem

We know of some issues that cause crashing in Hextech Crafting and are looking into a permanent solution. In the meantime, I recommend running Windows updates, as it has been able to resolve the issue for some players. 

I don't have a timeline on when the permanent fix will roll out, but let me know if you have any other questions.
